Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Cup
Description: Deep cup with an unrestricted mouth, thick outward-folded lip and flat base. The surface does not bear any slip and is pale pink in colour. The shape is asymmetrical and the plane of the mouth slanting, which denotes a lack of skill in the manufacturing process.
